書名: 彰化縣民間文學集9—故事篇（五）

段: 較早是三个姊妹仔呼，老母卜做生日啦，啊企算一个真好額啦，啊一个真散，有子無錢安呢就著啦！哦，啊彼个好額的轉來就共老母展啦，講：「哦！我一路安呢，風仔微微，吹阮綾羅紡絲啦！」啊這个散的人講：「阿母啊！阮佇路e5，風仔chiau2-chiau2，吹阮子的[尸+粦]鳥。」伊展錢毋啊伊展子毋，一人展一項毋。

Khah-cha2 si7 sann e5 chi2-moe7-a2 honn3, in lau7-bu2 beh cho3 senn-jit8 lah, ah khia7-sng3 chit8 e5 chin ho2-giah8 lah, ah chit8 e5 chin san3, u7 kiann2 bo5 chinn5 an2-ne to7 tioh8 lah! Ou5, ah hit e5 ho2-giah8--e5 tng2--lai5 to7 ka7 in lau7-bu2 tian2 lah , kong2: “Ou5! Goa2 chit8-lou7 an2-ne , hong-a2 bi5-bi5, chhoe goan2 leng5-lo5 phang2-si lah!” Ah chit e5 san3 e5 lang5 kong2: “A-bu2 ah! Goan2 ti7 lou7 e5, hong-a2 chiau2-chiau2, chhoe goan2 kiann2 e5 lan7-chiau2.” I tian2 chinn5 m7 ah i tian2 kiann2 m7, chit8 lang5 tian2 chit8 hang7 m7.
